entries.english: Caria Mwangi (look for Mwangi), Caria mbeca (look for money), Caria mahĩtia (look for errors/mistakes)

Gũcaria (to search), Gũcoka (to return/come back-person), Gũcokia (to return-object), Gũĩka (to do), Gũikara (to stay), Gũikara thĩ (to sit down), Gũikena (to be happy), Gũkinya (to arrive/step on), Gũthambia (to wash), Gũthĩĩ rũgendo (to go on journey), Gũthũkia (to damage/spoil), Gũtigara (to remain), Gũtinia (to cut), Gweterera (to wait), Gwĩcĩrĩria (to think/reason), Kũgeria (to try)

Ritho/Maitho (eye/eyes), Mũtwe/Mĩtwe (head/heads), Mũkangi/Mĩkangi (beak/beaks), Ngingo (neck), Ĩthagu/Mathagu (wings), Ruoya/Njoya (feather/feathers), Mwĩrĩ/Mĩrĩ (body/bodies), Njoya cia Kĩngũĩ (tail feathers), Kũgũrũ/Magũrũ (leg/legs)
